name: Dark Souls III: Ascended
summary:
Ascended is a mod that adds:
- New Enemy Types and Placements
- Changes in Enemy Physics and AI
- New Armor Set Effects on Each Piece
- New Ring and WeaponEffects
- New Enemy Debuffs
- Changes in Boss Fights

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Dark Souls 3 Ascended Mod Soul of Cinder
